<h3 id="X38039">X(38039) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(4), X(12)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*(b+c)*a^6+(b^2-6*b*c+c^2)*a^5-(b+c)*(7*b^2-8*b*c+7*c^2)*a^4-2*(b^2-b*c+c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^3+2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(4*b^2+b*c+4*c^2)*a^2+(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)*a-3*(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38039) = X(4)+2*X(37737) = X(12)+2*X(946) = X(40)-4*X(6668) = 4*X(1125)-X(30264) = X(1537)+2*X(8068) = 2*X(4999)-5*X(8227) = X(6831)+2*X(12047) = 4*X(9955)-X(26470) = 5*X(11522)+X(37710) = X(12699)+2*X(31659) = 4*X(13464)-X(37734) = 3*X(38027)-2*X(38033) = 3*X(38027)-4*X(38045) = 3*X(38058)-2*X(38129) = 3*X(38058)-4*X(38183) = 3*X(38078)-X(38157) = 3*X(38078)-2*X(38162) = 3*X(38109)-X(38129) = 3*X(38109)-2*X(38183)</b>
<p>X(38039) lies on these lines: {4,37737}, {5,3869}, {11,18389}, {12,946}, {30,38027}, {40,6668}, {381,952}, {515,4870}, {516,21155}, {517,17530}, {518,38148}, {519,38078}, {529,38021}, {758,3817}, {971,38056}, {1125,30264}, {1389,18357}, {1482,10599}, {1503,38051}, {1537,7680}, {1699,5842}, {2829,38063}, {2975,6913}, {3090,18231}, {3574,5777}, {3683,31260}, {4999,8227}, {5587,5855}, {5730,6867}, {5849,38035}, {5852,38036}, {5857,38037}, {5886,11113}, {6001,6831}, {6879,36279}, {6907,10129}, {6929,10532}, {6957,20060}, {6980,22791}, {7173,31870}, {7678,20330}, {10175,31165}, {11230,15670}, {11375,37468}, {11491,19541}, {11522,37710}, {11544,26877}, {12608,12671}, {12699,31659}, {13464,37734}, {28174,38114}, {28194,38134}, {28198,38070}</p>
<p>
X(38039) = midpoint of X(1699) and X(37701)<br>
X(38039) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (21155, 38062), (38033, 38045), (38058, 38109), (38129, 38183), (38157, 38162)<br>
X(38039) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (946, 17605, 1532), (5603, 38034, 38038), (7680, 18393, 1537), (38033, 38045, 38027), (38078, 38157, 38162), (38109, 38129, 38183), (38129, 38183, 38058)<br>
</p>
